short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically groups tabs opened in the same journey (or almost).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you open a tab from another one, if the parent tab has no group, both child and parent tab are grouped in a new one (named after the two longest words in the parent tab title).
